segments.text: Your silk garments have aroused much interest in our country ever since our first order was put on the market . We have no doubt we can do better this year if you appoint us your sales agent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We appreciate your intention , but the amount of your orders last year was moderate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's true . However at the Fair last March , people were so interested in Chinese garments that the demand this year will surely increase .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think it will help if we appoint a local agent ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure it will , if we are appointed your agent . Your garments are attractive , and we , a well-established importer with multiple sales channels , can boost the sales .
segments.speaker: S1
